name: Vitor Alencar
about: I'm a developer and speaker, focused on new and scalable technologies, who loves sharing knowledge, talking in some events and meetings about

experiences.name: AGENDAKIDS
experiences.description: Developing web and mobile applications in Javascript  using (React - new projects and Angular - old projects), webpack SASS, HTML, Mocha, for cliend-side and Node.js and Ruby and Rails on server-side

experiences.name: MILTECNOLOGIA
experiences.description: Creating innovative ERP projects HTML, CSS and JS to create SPAs (Single Page Applications) with AngularJS.

experiences.name: NORDESTE BANK
experiences.description: Allocated at Nordeste bank, my main role is to build applications for the development support sector (DREADS) and to assist in the administration of the exclusive domain of software development.

projects.name: DEV IO FOUNDATION
projects.description: The main idea of DEVIO Foundation is to unite all development groups in one place, making it possible to contribute actively to the growth of local community development.

projects.name: GDG FORTALEZA
projects.description: Google Developer Groups (GDG) are for developers who are interested in Google's developer technology; Everything from Android, Chrome, Drive, and Google Cloud platforms, to product APIs like the Cast API, Maps API, and YouTube API.

projects.name: FRONT-IN FORTALEZA
projects.description: Front-in Fortaleza was born as a Front-End conference, but today we are more than that. We were born together with the developer community in Brazil. We grow and mature together.
